modules.description: Sends a list of control messages to a device container, handling protocol-specific formatting and transmission. It operates on a custom `message` type and an `Avutil.container` structure representing the device. Used to issue commands like configuration updates or status requests during real-time device interaction.

Handles message reception from devices, allowing custom processing of incoming control messages. Operates on a specific `message` type representing device communications. Used to implement real-time device feedback in embedded systems or IoT applications.

Provides functions for decoding and encoding video streams, manipulating audio samples, and extracting metadata from multimedia files. Works with data types such as video frames, audio buffers, and stream metadata. Used to process video files for format conversion and to analyze audio content for spectral analysis.

manages device communication through message sending and receiving, using a custom `message` type and `Avutil.container` for device interaction. It supports real-time control operations such as configuration updates and status queries, as well as custom processing of incoming device feedback. Functions include protocol-aware message formatting, transmission, and event-driven message handling. Examples include adjusting video stream parameters or monitoring sensor data from embedded devices.
